com.nmgtime.logtrace.annos

注释类型 MethodLog


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=SOURCE)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface MethodLog
    Methods with this annotation will have trace logs added to their internal conditional statements, and optionally, try-catch statements can also be appended as needed.

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      boolean dur
      If true, the duration to execute this method will be printed.
      boolean exceptionLog
      If true, catch and print exception.
      String isOpen
      Like TraceLog.isOpen(), but the priority is higher.
      boolean noThrow
      Use with exceptionLog(), if true, only catch exception but not throw.
      boolean onlyVar
      If true, the if,switch statement's logs will not print, only print variables decorated with VarLog.
      org.slf4j.event.Level traceLevel
      Level of trace log.

    • 元素详细资料

      • exceptionLog

        public abstract boolean exceptionLog
        If true, catch and print exception. If the original method has already caught and handled the exception, it will be invalid.
        默认值:
        false

      • noThrow

        public abstract boolean noThrow
        Use with exceptionLog(), if true, only catch exception but not throw.
        默认值:
        false

      • dur

        public abstract boolean dur
        If true, the duration to execute this method will be printed.
        默认值:
        false

      • onlyVar

        public abstract boolean onlyVar
        If true, the if,switch statement's logs will not print, only print variables decorated with VarLog.
        默认值:
        false

      • traceLevel

        public abstract org.slf4j.event.Level traceLevel
        Level of trace log.
        默认值:
        org.slf4j.event.Level.INFO

      • isOpen

        public abstract String isOpen
        Like TraceLog.isOpen(), but the priority is higher.
        默认值:
        ""
